1.title: Cramping My Style
1.plot: Gary and Irina have a small house, two kids and not enough space. And now, Irina's Mom is coming to live with them. Mia and Rob present two great design solutions - whose will they choose?

2.title: My Space
2.plot: Krista and Vinh love their daughter, but they need an adult space to unwind and call their own. They've called upon Rob and Mia to help them build an oasis for adults. But will a leaky situation sidetrack the team?

3.title: Reno Lullaby
3.plot: Alex and Alexie are new parents. The arrival of their beautiful daughter has made their shift work even more of a challenge. Rob and Mia, will need to solve all their issues, but will a stinky obstacle get in their way?

4.title: From Maze to Masterful
4.plot: Sasha and Scott love their neighbourhood and their house but the layout is beyond strange.

5.title: World War Three
5.plot: Meet Tessa and Phil; a lovely couple with a son and a daughter who fight non-stop because they share a bedroom. Rob and Mia need to find them a solution fast, before world war three breaks out in their house.

6.title: Bring in the Light
6.plot: Stacey and Omer feel like prisoners in a dungeon. Their rooms are gloomy, dark and lack storage. Mia and Rob are up for the challenge of creating a light filled functional space but will an unexpected discovery run them over budget?

7.title: Everything in Its Place
7.plot: When sports enthusiasts Graham and Heather welcomed a second son, they went from a manageable space to a double purpose nursery and triple duty bedroom. Can Rob and Mia make it work for this growing family?

8.title: Four Storeys and Five Years Ago
8.plot: Angela and Tavis bought their four storey Row House five years ago when they were newlyweds. Five years later, they've turned into a family of four and the house is proving to be a challenge for their expanding family.

9.title: A Happy But a Crowded Life
9.plot: When Dayana and Steve first moved in, their house felt enormous and spacious. Then came the wedding, a dog, and a baby. The two are left to decide between a working kitchen or a laundry room they are no longer afraid of.

10.title: Up or Down
10.plot: "Up Or Down" - Sabrina's and Daryl"s dysfunctional space has them cooking out of the garage and making midnight bathroom trips to another floor with their young children.

11.title: From Hair Salon to Family Home
11.plot: Four years ago, Kristina and Daniel bought their first home, which turned out to be a repurposed hair salon.

1.title: Off the Floor
1.plot: Sandy and Dax have some major house anxiety. Sandy's cousin is living in the bedroom upstairs, they have a five year-old daughter, Sandy's wardrobe is in the basement and they have recently relocated their bedroom to the ground floor, right beside the front door. On top of that there is only one bathroom for four people. It's no wonder Sandy and Dax are feeling the pinch.

2.title: Reno Workout
2.plot: Sandy and Dax have some major house anxiety. Sandy's cousin is living in the bedroom upstairs, they have a five year-old daughter, Sandy's wardrobe is in the basement and they have recently relocated their bedroom to the ground floor, right beside the front door. On top of that there is only one bathroom for four people. It's no wonder Sandy and Dax are feeling the pinch.

3.title: Cramping My Style
3.plot: Melinda and Shawn live with two daughters under the age of two and they are busting at the seams. The kid's toys have completely taken over the house and to top it off, the in-laws often come over to help and resort to sleeping on a mattress in the middle of the living room. Mia and Rob take on the challenge as Melinda and Shawn have to decide between a functional second floor or a basement they are no longer afraid of.

4.title: Tight Squeeze
4.plot: When Stuart and Christine bought their home 12 years ago, it was perfect for a family with small kids. Now with two teenage daughters, their house has become claustrophobic and totally unmanageable. The music instruments are in the dining room, Stuart's office is in his daughter bedroom and guests are sleeping on an air mattress in the basement. Stuart and Christine are at their wits end.

5.title: Baby Is Coming
5.plot: CJ and Matt are expecting their first baby but their home isn't ready to welcome their newborn. They have a postage stamp-size kitchen with their pantry and microwave in the hallway, a dining room that doubles as an office and a bathroom that CJ finds so yucky she wears flip-flops in the shower. CJ and Matt have two big decisions to make: the baby's name and which design plan to pick.

6.title: House Disaster
6.plot: When Glenda and Alias first moved in, their house was just the right fit. Three years, two young kids, a cat and a huge dog later, their home feels small and extremely cramped! Their upstairs layout is just too tight and their basement is unsafe and dingy. Rob and Mia are up for the challenge, but Glenda and Alias will need to decide between a functional jam-packed basement, or a separate office and master suite on the second floor.

7.title: Full House
7.plot: Morgan and Chris have a small house, two young daughters and an ever-expanding toy collection. They're crawling over tea sets, doll houses, stuffed animals and each other! Add the in-laws six months of the year and it's a full house. The three B's - bedroom, bathroom and basement - are just not working for them. Rob and Mia will need to solve all their issues, but will a structural issue derail their plans?

imdb.plot outline: Let's face it - sometimes your dream house ends up being a nightmare. What might have been the perfect home ten years ago, barely makes the cut these days. Whether a family grows, in-laws move in or someone starts a home business, sometimes there just simply isn't enough space. So what do you do when you need more space but its impossible to make your house larger? That's when The Expandables take over. From blowing out an entire second floor to overhauling a basement, The Expandables will design and build new spaces that the homeowners would never have believed possible, without adding one extra square foot! The Expandables will do whatever it takes to increase the area of a home to meet a family's needs. When you can't make your house bigger, they make it better.
imdb.title: The Expandables
plot: _The Expandables_ (qv) is a real world construction show that pits Rob and his innovative crew of renovation experts against the ultimate challenge: design and build new spaces that the homeowners would never have believed possible.::HGTV Canada
